title: Tried to log in client. Says account in permanently suspended and check email. No email shown.

replies.body: I got an email about perma ban with no prior emails.. I think it's bugging out
Same here bro you are not the only one! I don't know why I am banned for no reason and did not get an email!

Don't worry, we can help!  Looking into the account, it looks like we put a security lock on it for the account's protection.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team will help with restoration.  We'll see you there!
